name: Open Me! Full Game
description:
An addictive augmented reality puzzle game for the PS Vita system that challenges players to think “outside the box”. The goal is simple: open the box and collect the items inside. But be prepared – each box has its own unique traps that require you to think creatively. There is also a multiplayer mode where communication skills and speed between players are key to opening these boxes. Take the challenge and think outside the box!

Includes:
- Open Me!™ Trial Pack
- Open Me!™ Packs 1-12

Note: Open Me!™ Trial Pack must be downloaded in order to use add-ons

1 player(s)
585KB Minimum
